name: polar-webapp-dist
description: An internal package to contain our assets for bundling with the webapp so that we can just depend on the bundle to include our assets.

scripts.dist: rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && cd ../../polar-bookshelf && yarn run build-webapp && cp -rp dist/public/* ../polar-app-private/polar-webapp-dist/public
scripts.test: if [ -z $(find src -name '**Test.js') ]; then echo 'No tests'; else yarn run mocha; fi;
